text: hananim-eun jasig-eul duji ani hasyeoss-eumyeo geubun-eul daejeoghal eotteohan sindo eobsnola man-il daleun manh-eun sindeul-i iss-eossdamyeon gag sindeul-eun jagiga changjohan geos-eul ppaeas-a gass-eul geos-imyeo daleun sin-eul jibaehaess-eulila hananim-iyeogeudeul-i myosahaneun geos-eul chowolhayeo hollo yeong-gwangbad-eusoseo
